short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simplest way to get notified about new feed entries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RSS Alarm is a chrome extension which periodically checks RSS feeds in the background and informs you via notifications if there are news or updates at any of your subscribed rss feeds.
